short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily send webpages, images, or text to Hyperplace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hyperplace, create dedicated spaces for your interests, collect relevant ideas, and discover how they come together in meaningful new ways.

With this simple extension, you can save content from any webpage directly to your Hyperplace places along with personal notes. 

Saved items will wait in the drawer until you decide where to place them. Explore them with the AI assistant, pin them onto the wall or add them to your documents.

To get started, just log in or sign up for a free account.
